Name: Shaped Beats
About the game: This Isn't Any Bullet Hell, It's Completely Different. Inspired by Beasts of Lovecraft Shaped Beats It Is A 2D Video Game Of The Bullet Hell Genre With Pixel Art Graphics. Story Mode (1 Player) Overcome Different Challenges, Challenges increasingly difficult, and discover the secrets that exist in space Defeat Different Enemies and Imposing Bosses And Discover the Truth of what happens in other worlds. Versus Play Friendly Matches With Default Settings, Or Play 1 VS 1 where you arrange how you want to play. All This And Others In Shaped Beats
